commit.message:
configure.ac: When passing --enable-languages to subdir configure when host != build...

	* configure.ac: When passing --enable-languages to subdir
	configure when host != build, make sure we don't pass an empty
	value.
	* configure: Regenerate.

From-SVN: r78969

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,10 @@
+2004-03-05  Ian Lance Taylor  <ian@wasabisystems.com>
+
+	* configure.ac: When passing --enable-languages to subdir
+	configure when host != build, make sure we don't pass an empty
+	value.
+	* configure: Regenerate.
+
 2004-03-05  Nathan Sidwell  <nathan@codesourcery.com>
 
 	PR 13577

@@ -981,7 +981,7 @@ ac_abs_top_srcdir=`cd "$ac_dir" && cd $ac_top_srcdir && pwd`
     else
       echo "$as_me: WARNING: no configuration information is in $ac_dir" >&2
     fi
-    cd "$ac_popdir"
+    cd $ac_popdir
   done
 fi
 
@@ -1178,7 +1178,7 @@ _ASBOX
       echo "$as_me: caught signal $ac_signal"
     echo "$as_me: exit $exit_status"
   } >&5
-  rm -f core *.core &&
+  rm -f core core.* *.core &&
   rm -rf conftest* confdefs* conf$$* $ac_clean_files &&
     exit $exit_status
      ' 0
@@ -2517,7 +2517,8 @@ if { (eval echo "$as_me:$LINENO: \"$ac_compile\"") >&5
   echo "$as_me:$LINENO: \$? = $ac_status" >&5
   (exit $ac_status); }; }; then
   for ac_declaration in \
-   '' \
+   ''\
+   '#include <stdlib.h>' \
    'extern "C" void std::exit (int) throw (); using std::exit;' \
    'extern "C" void std::exit (int); using std::exit;' \
    'extern "C" void exit (int) throw ();' \
@@ -2531,8 +2532,8 @@ _ACEOF
 cat confdefs.h >>conftest.$ac_ext
 cat >>conftest.$ac_ext <<_ACEOF
 /* end confdefs.h.  */
-$ac_declaration
 #include <stdlib.h>
+$ac_declaration
 int
 main ()
 {
@@ -4007,7 +4008,7 @@ sed 's/^/| /' conftest.$ac_ext >&5
 ( exit $ac_status )
 ac_cv_header_stdc=no
 fi
-rm -f core *.core gmon.out bb.out conftest$ac_exeext conftest.$ac_objext conftest.$ac_ext
+rm -f core core.* *.core gmon.out bb.out conftest$ac_exeext conftest.$ac_objext conftest.$ac_ext
 fi
 fi
 fi
@@ -5005,7 +5006,7 @@ if test "${gcc_cv_prog_makeinfo_modern+set}" = set; then
 else
     ac_prog_version=`$MAKEINFO --version 2>&1 |
                    sed -n 's/^.*GNU texinfo.* \([0-9][0-9.]*\).*$/\1/p'`
-  echo "configure:5008: version of makeinfo is $ac_prog_version" >&5
+  echo "configure:5009: version of makeinfo is $ac_prog_version" >&5
   case $ac_prog_version in
     '')     gcc_cv_prog_makeinfo_modern=no;;
     4.[2-9]*)
@@ -5343,7 +5344,7 @@ sed 's/^/| /' conftest.$ac_ext >&5
 ( exit $ac_status )
 ac_cv_header_stdc=no
 fi
-rm -f core *.core gmon.out bb.out conftest$ac_exeext conftest.$ac_objext conftest.$ac_ext
+rm -f core core.* *.core gmon.out bb.out conftest$ac_exeext conftest.$ac_objext conftest.$ac_ext
 fi
 fi
 fi
@@ -5982,7 +5983,7 @@ sed 's/^/| /' conftest.$ac_ext >&5
 ( exit $ac_status )
 ac_cv_c_bigendian=yes
 fi
-rm -f core *.core gmon.out bb.out conftest$ac_exeext conftest.$ac_objext conftest.$ac_ext
+rm -f core core.* *.core gmon.out bb.out conftest$ac_exeext conftest.$ac_objext conftest.$ac_ext
 fi
 fi
 fi
@@ -6581,7 +6582,7 @@ sed 's/^/| /' conftest.$ac_ext >&5
 ( exit $ac_status )
 gcc_cv_func_mbstowcs_works=no
 fi
-rm -f core *.core gmon.out bb.out conftest$ac_exeext conftest.$ac_objext conftest.$ac_ext
+rm -f core core.* *.core gmon.out bb.out conftest$ac_exeext conftest.$ac_objext conftest.$ac_ext
 fi
 fi
 echo "$as_me:$LINENO: result: $gcc_cv_func_mbstowcs_works" >&5
@@ -6752,7 +6753,7 @@ sed 's/^/| /' conftest.$ac_ext >&5
 ( exit $ac_status )
 ac_cv_type_getgroups=int
 fi
-rm -f core *.core gmon.out bb.out conftest$ac_exeext conftest.$ac_objext conftest.$ac_ext
+rm -f core core.* *.core gmon.out bb.out conftest$ac_exeext conftest.$ac_objext conftest.$ac_ext
 fi
 if test $ac_cv_type_getgroups = cross; then
         cat >conftest.$ac_ext <<_ACEOF
@@ -6846,7 +6847,7 @@ sed 's/^/| /' conftest.$ac_ext >&5
 ( exit $ac_status )
 gcc_cv_func_printf_ptr=no
 fi
-rm -f core *.core gmon.out bb.out conftest$ac_exeext conftest.$ac_objext conftest.$ac_ext
+rm -f core core.* *.core gmon.out bb.out conftest$ac_exeext conftest.$ac_objext conftest.$ac_ext
 fi
 rm -f core core.* *.core
 fi
@@ -7259,7 +7260,7 @@ sed 's/^/| /' conftest.$ac_ext >&5
 ( exit $ac_status )
 ac_cv_func_fork_works=no
 fi
-rm -f core *.core gmon.out bb.out conftest$ac_exeext conftest.$ac_objext conftest.$ac_ext
+rm -f core core.* *.core gmon.out bb.out conftest$ac_exeext conftest.$ac_objext conftest.$ac_ext
 fi
 fi
 echo "$as_me:$LINENO: result: $ac_cv_func_fork_works" >&5
@@ -7414,7 +7415,7 @@ sed 's/^/| /' conftest.$ac_ext >&5
 ( exit $ac_status )
 ac_cv_func_vfork_works=no
 fi
-rm -f core *.core gmon.out bb.out conftest$ac_exeext conftest.$ac_objext conftest.$ac_ext
+rm -f core core.* *.core gmon.out bb.out conftest$ac_exeext conftest.$ac_objext conftest.$ac_ext
 fi
 fi
 echo "$as_me:$LINENO: result: $ac_cv_func_vfork_works" >&5
@@ -8443,7 +8444,7 @@ sed 's/^/| /' conftest.$ac_ext >&5
 ( exit $ac_status )
 gcc_cv_initfini_array=no
 fi
-rm -f core *.core gmon.out bb.out conftest$ac_exeext conftest.$ac_objext conftest.$ac_ext
+rm -f core core.* *.core gmon.out bb.out conftest$ac_exeext conftest.$ac_objext conftest.$ac_ext
 fi
 fi
 echo "$as_me:$LINENO: result: $gcc_cv_initfini_array" >&5
@@ -8910,7 +8911,7 @@ else
 	saved_CFLAGS="${CFLAGS}"
 	CC="${CC_FOR_BUILD}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS_FOR_BUILD}" \
 	${realsrcdir}/configure \
-		--enable-languages=${enable_languages} \
+		--enable-languages=${enable_languages-all} \
 		--target=$target_alias --host=$build_alias --build=$build_alias
 	CFLAGS="${saved_CFLAGS}"
